content:
Looking at https://doc.rust-lang.org/cargo/reference/overriding-dependencies.html#the-patch-section

I'm wondering if I can override one of my local packages where I have

[workspace]
members = ["foo", "bar"]

and want to add

[patch]
bar = { git = "...", rev = "..." }

you technically may be able to do this with something like [patch.'file:///path/to/your/dep'] but AFAIK no one's ever done that and it's probably entirely untested in Cargo, in general patches are only meant for git/registry deps
